reasons_to_visit.details: Preview shows, jazz festivals, and outdoor bars open across the city.
Portobello and East Lothian beaches welcome swimmers and paddleboarders.

reasons_to_reconsider.details: Royal Mile and castle become busy even before the Fringe.

weather.precipitation: Light rain with warm, humid afternoons.
weather.general_tips: Book timed castle entry and carry refillable water bottle.

tourism_level.overall_atmosphere: Vibrant city preparing for festival takeover.

events_holidays.name: Edinburgh Jazz & Blues Festival
events_holidays.description: Concerts spill into tents and pubs across the city.
events_holidays.notes: Many gigs free-arrive early for seats.

unique_experiences.description: Join local Wild Ones for sunrise dips.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Wear neoprene gloves/boots; check tide times.

weather.general_tips: Carry lightweight rain jacket and comfortable shoes for long festival days.

tourism_level.overall_atmosphere: Electric with performers rehearsing across the city.

events_holidays.name: Tattoo rehearsals
events_holidays.description: Military bands practise atop the castle, audible across the city.
events_holidays.notes: Free to watch glimpses from Johnston Terrace.

unique_experiences.description: Catch work-in-progress comedy shows before official opening.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Book via Fringe box office; cheaper than August runs.

unique_experiences.description: Learn about Leith's maritime gin heritage.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Arrive via tram; tours sell out weeks ahead.
